text: Prokopyevsk () is a city in Kemerovo Oblast, Russia. Population: == History == It was founded in 1918 as the settlement of Prokopyevsky (). It was given town status and renamed to Prokopyevsk in 1931. == Economy == Prokopyevsk is one of the main places of coal mining in the Kuznetsk Basin (Kuzbass). == References == === Notes === === Sources === * * Category:Cities and towns in Kemerovo Oblast
title: Prokopyevsk
